title: TransactionPool errors in log during initial sync
body:

### Description
Besu should ignore remote transactions when it is syncing, but during sync (checkpoint sync in this case) besu is logging errors trying to add remote transactions to the transaction pool:

```
2022-06-29 17:25:21.867+00:00 | EthScheduler-Transactions-6005 | ERROR | Besu | Uncaught exception in thread "EthScheduler-Transactions-6005"
java.util.NoSuchElementException: No value present
        at java.base/java.util.Optional.get(Optional.java:148)
        at org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.transactions.TransactionPool.getChainHeadBlockHeader(TransactionPool.java:296)
        at org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.transactions.TransactionPool.minTransactionGasPrice(TransactionPool.java:300)
        at org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.transactions.TransactionPool.addRemoteTransactions(TransactionPool.java:146)
        at org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.transactions.TransactionsMessageProcessor.processTransactionsMessage(TransactionsMessageProcessor.java:111)
        at org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.transactions.TransactionsMessageProcessor.processTransactionsMessage(TransactionsMessageProcessor.java:85)
        at org.hyperledger.besu.ethereum.eth.transactions.TransactionsMessageHandler.lambda$exec$0(TransactionsMessageHandler.java:48)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1128)
        at java.base/java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:628)
        at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:829)
```

### Acceptance Criteria
* when besu is performing the initial chain sync, remote transactions should be ignored

### Steps to Reproduce (Bug)
1. start besu with checkpoint sync on mainnet
2. observe logged errors handing remote transactions during sync

**Expected behavior:** [What you expect to happen]
No errors, and no handling of remote transactions during sync

**Actual behavior:** [What actually happens]
besu fails to add remote transactions to the transasction pool during sync since there is not a chain head yet.

**Frequency:** [What percentage of the time does it occur?]


### Versions (Add all that apply)
* Software version: 22.7.0-RC1-SNAPSHOT
* Java version: 17
* OS Name & Version: linux/docker
